resource.chars:
Every indication seems to point
toward another successful Reveille.
Greater interest among the stu-
dents, however, can be evidenced.
Some are saying that the year book
should be a finer one than that of
last year, because the present staff
should profit by previous exper-
ience. We do know one thing,
every single publication fee should
be in the hands of the business man-
ager within the next few weeks.
A number have yet to pay their
publication fees. This group prom-
ised on the first day of school to
pay within a very short time. They
have failed to do so and there is no
excuse.
U. of M.
